verbose_text: Briefly, for flow cytometry mediated isolation of zebrafish ECs, Tg (kdrl : GFP) s843 embryos were dissected and trunks collected in ice cold Ca 2+ / Mg 2+ -free Hank 's buffered salt solution (HBSS), washed four times in 1 mL ice cold Ca 2+ / Mg 2+ -free HBSS and dissociated in 2 mL TrypLE (Invitrogen) at 27.5degreesC for 30 min with regular agitation.
evidence: mediated isolation of zebrafish ECs, Tg(kdrl:GFP) s843  embryos were dissected and trunks collected in ice cold Ca 2+ /Mg 2+ -free Hank's buffered salt
